Class.Name: Tarot Weaver
Class.Author: Homebrew
Class.Description: Tarot-based class with Major Arcana, Minor Arcana, and Summons.

Card.Name: The Fool
Card.Effect: Leap of Faith — Teleport unpredictably, gaining invulnerability for 1 turn.
Card.Meta: Teleport randomly within 5*AM feet

Card.Name: The Magician
Card.Effect: Channel Arcana — Amplify the effect of your next spell.
Card.Meta: Amplify spell damage or heal with AM. Flip card

Card.Name: The High Priestess
Card.Effect: Veil of Mystery — Become invisible/shielded by illusions.
Card.Meta: Illusions hide you for 1 turn. 1 extra turn per 5 levels. If found, flip card.

Card.Name: The Empress
Card.Effect: Bountiful Growth — Heal allies.
Card.Meta: Heal for 1d8 + AM

Card.Name: The Emperor
Card.Effect: Authority's Command — Enforce order, immobilizing enemies.
Card.Meta: You loudly command a being to do something. DC 10 + intimidation to resist.

Card.Name: The Hierophant
Card.Effect: Sacred Rite — Call divine protection or inspire allies.
Card.Meta: Give inspiration to an ally

Card.Name: The Lovers
Card.Effect: Sacred Bond — Link two beings: share buffs and healing.
Card.Meta: Link two beings. Any damage or effect done to one applies to the other.

Card.Name: The Chariot
Card.Effect: Victory’s Charge — Surge forward with unstoppable force.
Card.Meta: Dash 15 ft forward. Hit? 1d8+AM bludgeoning. DC10+AM to resist. Flip if success.

Card.Name: Strength
Card.Effect: Lionheart — Temporary immense strength, immune to fear.
Card.Meta: 3 turns: fists 1d10+AM. Can discard another card for extra attack, up to 2 attacks. Other major arcana inactive. Flip after duration.

Card.Name: The Hermit
Card.Effect: Lamp of Wisdom — Reveal hidden truths, secrets, or enemies.
Card.Meta: Reveal secrets/enemies within 15 ft. Through objects. DC10+Investigation. Flip if nothing found.

Card.Name: Wheel of Fortune
Card.Effect: Turn the Wheel — Randomly shifts battlefield conditions in your favor.
Card.Meta: Make rough terrain under/around 1d4 enemies.

Card.Name: Justice
Card.Effect: Balance — Reflect damage back at attacker.
Card.Meta: Next attack to you or ally reflected. DC check applies. Flip if success.

Card.Name: The Hanged Man
Card.Effect: Sacrifice — Lose energy to grant great power to another.
Card.Meta: Give 1d8+AM HP to an ally. Card is flipped.

Card.Name: Death
Card.Effect: Transformation — End something to begin anew.
Card.Meta: End any status effect on self, ally, or enemy. Flip if ally healed.

Card.Name: Temperance
Card.Effect: Alchemical Harmony — Blend elements for balance and healing.
Card.Meta: Make random potion from surroundings. Takes 10 turns. Flip if disturbed.

Card.Name: The Devil
Card.Effect: Chains of Temptation — Bind enemies with desire or fear.
Card.Meta: Inflict fear on 1d4 random enemies

Card.Name: The Tower
Card.Effect: Cataclysm — Sudden destructive blast, reshaping battlefield.
Card.Meta: Shoot powerful beam. 1d12+AM. Dex save 15 for half. Hole 10 ft wide at impact. Flip card.

Card.Name: The Star
Card.Effect: Guiding Light — Renew hope, restore mana/energy, long-term buff.
Card.Meta: Restore 1 spell slot per ally. Takes 1 turn. Flip if damaged before next turn.

Card.Name: The Moon
Card.Effect: Dreamscape — Create illusions, manipulate perception.
Card.Meta: Make an enemy hallucinate for 3 turns. Flip if they hit an ally.

Card.Name: The Sun
Card.Effect: Radiant Blessing — Empower allies, heal, and dispel darkness.
Card.Meta: Sunlight 10 ft radius. Heal 1 hp start/end turn. Flip if 5 beings enter radius.

Card.Name: Judgement
Card.Effect: Final Call — Revive allies, restore willpower.
Card.Meta: Revive an ally

Card.Name: The World
Card.Effect: Completion — Achieve ultimate success: fulfill quest/objective instantly.
Card.Meta: Redraw hand and spend 1 new card

Card.Name: Ace of Cups
Card.Effect: Spring of Vitality — A sudden surge of healing.
Card.Meta: Heal 1d4 + AM to one ally.

Card.Name: Two of Cups
Card.Effect: Shared Harmony — Heal two allies simultaneously.
Card.Meta: Heal 1d4 + AM to two allies.

Card.Name: Three of Cups
Card.Effect: Circle of Renewal — Group healing and morale boost.
Card.Meta: Heal all allies in 10 ft radius 1d4 HP, advantage next save.

Card.Name: Four of Cups
Card.Effect: Reflective Rest — Minor healing with meditation.
Card.Meta: Heal 1d6 HP to self. No effect if disturbed.

Card.Name: Five of Cups
Card.Effect: Mourning Relief — Heal after suffering.
Card.Meta: Heal 1d6 + AM HP to an ally who took damage this turn.

Card.Name: Six of Cups
Card.Effect: Nostalgic Comfort — Restore minor wounds.
Card.Meta: Heal 1d4 + AM to up to 3 allies.

Card.Name: Seven of Cups
Card.Effect: Choice of Healing — Multiple healing options.
Card.Meta: Choose 1–3 allies. Heal 1d4 each or grant temporary HP 1d6.

Card.Name: Eight of Cups
Card.Effect: Focused Rejuvenation — Strong healing for one.
Card.Meta: Heal 1d8 + AM to a single ally.

Card.Name: Nine of Cups
Card.Effect: Wish Fulfilled — Great healing and minor boon.
Card.Meta: Heal 1d8 + AM and +1 to next attack/save.

Card.Name: Ten of Cups
Card.Effect: Overflowing Restoration — Heal the party fully.
Card.Meta: Heal all allies 1d6 + AM and remove one minor status effect.

Summon.Name: Page of Cups
Summon.Effect: Heals 1d4 + AM HP per turn to one ally. Can cure minor conditions.

Summon.Name: Knight of Cups
Summon.Effect: Mounted spirit heals all allies in 10 ft 1 HP each turn. Once per summon: restore 1d6 + AM HP to one ally.

Summon.Name: Queen of Cups
Summon.Effect: Healing aura 10 ft radius. Allies heal 1d4 + AM per turn. Once per summon: cleanse one major status effect.

Summon.Name: King of Cups
Summon.Effect: Allies in 30 ft heal 1d6 + AM per turn. Death saves at advantage. Once per summon: revive downed ally to 1 HP.
